member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.Content.ContentPackAssetProvider
member.summary: Asset provider for a content pack.

member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.Content.IAssetProvider
member.summary:
A provider for game assets. You may use to specify which content source you want to use.
For custom content sources, it is recommended that you create a class that extends to identify which one you want to inject into your service.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Content.IAssetProvider.Load``1(System.String)
member.summary: Loads an asset from this content source.
member.typeparam: The type of asset to load.
member.param: The path to the asset relative to this content source.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Content.IAssetProvider.Open(System.String,System.IO.FileMode)
member.summary: Opens a file in this content source.
member.param: The mode to open the file in.

member.summary: Tracks changes to assets.

member.name: E:TehPers.Core.Api.Content.IAssetTracker.AssetLoading
member.summary: Invoked whenever an asset is loaded or reloaded.

member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IGlobalKernel
member.summary: A factory capable of creating any type of object based on bindings. It is the parent of every mod's kernel, however it doesn't automatically know about any bindings in them.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IGlobalKernel.Proxy(Ninject.Planning.Bindings.IBinding,Ninject.IKernel)
member.summary: Adds a proxied binding to the kernel. The binding will be resolved by making a request to the binding's original parent.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IGlobalKernel.Unproxy(Ninject.Planning.Bindings.IBinding)
member.summary: Removes a proxied binding from the kernel.
member.param: The binding to remove the proxy for.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IGlobalKernel.Unproxy(System.Type,Ninject.IKernel)
member.summary: Removes all proxied bindings for a particular service from the kernel.
member.param: The type of service to remove proxies for.
The parent kernel for those proxies.

member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IModKernel

member.summary: Gets the global kernel. Services without bindings in this are resolved by the global kernel.

member.summary: Factory for creating an for a .

member.name: P:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.IModKernelFactory.GlobalServices
member.summary: Gets the global service container. Injected mod APIs can be found here.
member.example:
To retrieve a mod's injected API:
var api = kernelFactory.GlobalKernel.Get<SomeModApi>();

member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.ModServices
member.summary: The global mod services. This contains the mod kernel factory, for example.

member.name: P:TehPers.Core.Api.DI.ModServices.Factory
member.summary: Gets the for creating mod kernels. This value is guaranteed to be if TehPers.Core has not been loaded yet. To ensure that your mod loads after the core mod, add TehPers.Core as a dependency in your mod's manifest. If you do not need the core mod to be loaded for your mod to function, then you may add it as an optional dependency instead.

member.summary: Tries to get an item factory for an item with the given key from this item namespace.

An instance of an item with the given key.
member.returns: if the key is valid for an item in this namespace, otherwise.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceProvider.GetKnownItemKeys
member.summary: Gets all the known, predefined item keys within this namespace. This may not return every valid item key in this namespace. For example, dynamically created items may not be returned. This should be treated as a guide for mods to know what items are available within this namespace.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceProvider.Reload
member.summary: Reloads the namespace provider.

member.name: T:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceRegistry
member.summary: A registry of all registered namespaces. Namespaces are reloaded whenever a save is loaded, however they can also be reloaded on demand.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceRegistry.GetRegisteredNamespaces
member.summary: Gets the registered namespaces.

member.summary: Tries to get an for the given .
member.returns: if the key is valid for an item, otherwise.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceRegistry.GetKnownItemKeys
member.summary: Gets all the known, predefined item keys within all namespaces. This may not return every valid item key. For example, dynamically created items may not be returned. This should be treated as a guide for mods to know what items are available within all namespaces.

member.name: M:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceRegistry.RequestReload
member.summary: Reloads each namespace provider.

member.name: E:TehPers.Core.Api.Items.INamespaceRegistry.OnReload
member.summary: Invoked whenever the namespace provider is reloaded.
